thread.title: 'Power Rangers' movie trailer rockets up the nostalgia
thread.title_full: 'Power Rangers' movie trailer rockets up the nostalgia

author: USA TODAY
title: 'Power Rangers' movie trailer rockets up the nostalgia
text:
'Power Rangers' movie trailer rockets up the nostalgia Kelly Lawler , USA TODAY 9:00 a.m. ET Jan. 19, 2017 8 Shares x Share The 90s heroes are back! The Rangers return in a new live-action film out in 2017. Lionsgate. 
It is, in fact, morphin' time. 
If you were worried that the upcoming Power Rangers movie was going to be a little too dark based on the first images and teaser trailer, you can set your Millennial mind at ease. The first full trailer for the film, which stars Naomi Scott, Becky G., Dacre Montgomery, Ludi Lin and RJ Cyler as the technicolor heroes, captures some of the cheese and humor that made the 1990s shows such hits. Plus, you know, the mighty morphin action. 
The trailer also gives us glimpses of Bryan Cranston as Zordon , Elizabeth Banks' Rita Repulsa and Bill Hader voicing Alpha 5. Combined with the giant monster battles, what else does a Power Rangers movie need? 
Watch the full trailer above. The movie hits theaters March 24. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2k4jxhg Most Popular
